msg.msgText:
Set the SNMP agent IP address or addresses.
SYNTAX: imaserver set SNMPAgentAddress help imaserver set "SNMPAgentAddress=IPAddress"
NOTES: 1. Specify host IP address or addresses that are configured on the system. Use a comma-separated list to specify more than one address. 2. Each "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
